add-a-song: Aggiungi un cantico dal nostro libro dei cantici alla lista dei media dell'adunanza.
add-a-video-explain: Add one of the videos from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses to the media list. The latest videos are displayed here, but you can also search through all videos if needed.
advancedDescription: Gli utenti di avanzati potrebbero voler armeggiare con queste impostazioni, ma la configurazione di default è di solito abbastanza buona.
also-look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Inoltre, cerca questo pulsante in fondo alla pagina di M³:
app-description: Meeting Media Manager è un'app multipiattaforma per la visualizzazione dei contenuti multimediali alle adunanze di congregazione dei Testimoni di Geova. Si integra con OBS Studio per mostrare con un clic i contenuti sia in Sala del Regno che su Zoom. Con le sue numerose funzionalità e l'interfaccia intuitiva, M³ riduce il lavoro dei tecnici audio/video. Supporta tutti i formati di file teocratici, nonché file PDF e file multimediali comuni. Può integrare o persino sostituire JW Library, secondo le vostre esigenze di congregazione.
app-issues: Se hai problemi o hai trovato un bug, crea un Issue sulla nostra pagina di GitHub o contattaci tramite Discussion su GitHub, descrivendo il problema nel dettaglio. Vi risponderemo il prima possibile.
applicationConfigurationDescription: Personalizza il comportamento e l'aspetto di questa app
are-you-sure-delete: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare il file "{mediaToDelete}"?
are-you-sure-delete-all: Are you sure you want to delete all extra media files for the selected day?
are-you-sure-delete-cache: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare tutti i file nella cache?
are-you-sure-delete-unused-cache: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare i file inutilizzati dalla cache?
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-pro: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare il profilo {profileName}?
autoStartAtLogin: Avvia automaticamente M³ all'avvio del computer
autoStartAtLogin-explain: M³ può avviarsi automaticamente quando il computer viene avviato.
autoStartMusic: Avvia automaticamente musica di sottofondo prima delle adunanze
autoStartMusic-explain: La musica di sottofondo inizierà automaticamente se un'adunanza è programmata per iniziare nei minuti o nelle ore dopo l'avvio di M³.
baseUrl-explain: Enter the address used to access the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses.
choose-a-document-for-import: Scegli il documento contenente il file multimediale.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-start-and-: Clicking it will allow you to start and stop the playback of background music. Music will start playing automatically before a meeting is scheduled to start when M³ is launched, and will also stop automatically before the meeting starts. However, background music playback will need to be manually started after the closing prayer, using this button.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-temporaril: Cliccando su di esso potrai nascondere temporaneamente i contenuti multimediali e la scrittura dell'anno e mostrare i partecipanti Zoom. Una volta terminata la parte Zoom è possibile mostrare di nuovo la scrittura dell'anno utilizzando lo stesso pulsante.
clicking-the-close-button-again-will-clo: Cliccando di nuovo lo stesso pulsante si uscirà da M³.
coWeek: Prossima visita programmata del sorvegliante di circoscrizione
coWeek-explain: If entered, M³ will automatically move the midweek meeting to Tuesday on that week. It will also skip media for the Congregation Bible Study, and skip the closing songs for both the midweek and weekend meetings.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-captu: Configurare una scena in OBS Studio per catturare la finestra dei contenuti multimediali.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-show-: Configurare una scena in OBS Studio per mostrare un'ampia inquadratura del palco.
configure-the-websocket-plugin-in-obs-st: Avrai bisogno di configurare il plugin Websocket in OBS Studio Anche il plugin Fotocamera Virtuale è richiesto, quindi assicurati che sia installato e configurato.
congregation-lookup-explain: Enter keywords such as your congregation's name as well as the city or area in which it is located. This information will be used to attempt to automatically retrieve the meeting schedule and language.
congregationMeetingsDescription: Impostazioni relative alla tua congregazione e al programma delle adunanze
congregationName-explain: Questo nome verrà mostrato nel menu di selezione profilo dell'applicazione.
currently-loading: Il contenuto multimediale per questa data è attualmente in caricamento.
custom-background-removed: The custom background has now been removed.
custom-background-set: The chosen image is now displayed instead of the yeartext.
custom-background-will-not-persist: Please note that the custom background will not be saved if you quit the app.
darkMode-explain: Forza l'applicazione a utilizzare la modalità chiara o scura oppure usa quella predefinita nel sistema
disableMediaFetching: Usa M³ come complemento di JW Library
disableMediaFetching-explain: Enabling this will disable automatic media fetching in M³. In that case, JW Library can be used to display normal meeting media, and M³ can be used to display other manually added media. M³ has many practical features such as adding PDF documents and zooming and panning of images. Please note that this toggle should be disabled in almost all cases.
does-your-kingdom-hall-use-a-program-cal: Nella tua Sala del Regno si usa un programma chiamato OBS Studio?
doing-so-will-greatly-simplify-and-facil: Questo semplificherà notevolmente la condivisione dei contenuti multimediali durante le adunanze ibride.
dont-forget-add-missing-media: Don't forget to add any missing songs or media.
dont-forget-to-add-circuit-overseer-date: For best results, add the date of the circuit overseer's visit to the "{ congregationMeetings }" section in { settings }.
drag-and-drop-or: Trascina e rilascia file qui o
enableExtraCache: Memorizza i file video dei cantici
enableExtraCache-explain: Memorizza tutti i video del libro dei cantici per migliorare le prestazioni. Nota che questo aumenterà la dimensione della cache multimediale.
enableFolderWatcher-explain: This feature monitors a folder of your choice for new files, automatically adding them to the media list.
enableKeyboardShortcuts-explain: Usa le scorciatoie da tastiera per semplificare la presentazione dei contenuti multimediali.
enableMediaDisplayButton-explain: Mostra immagini e video in una finestra o su una schermo esterno. Se utilizzato in Sala del Regno, nella maggior parte dei casi dovrebbe essere abilitato.
enableMusicButton-explain: Riproduci musica prima e dopo le adunanze con pochi clic.
enableSubtitles-explain: Abilita i sottotitoli per impostazione predefinita per tutti i video.
enter-a-key-combination-now-using-your-k: Inserisci una combinazione di tasti ora usando la tastiera.
enter-the-port-and-password-configured-i: Inserire la porta e la password configurate nel plugin Websocket di OBS Studio.
errorDownloadingMeetingMedia: Errore durante il download del media per la riunione
excludeFootnotes: Escludi media contenuti nelle note in calce dello studio Torre di Guardia
excludeFootnotes-explain: Non includere video o altri supporti da note a piè di pagina in articoli Watchtower.
excludeTh: Escludi tutti i media dell'opuscolo Lettura e insegnamento (th)
excludeTh-explain: Non includere video o altri media dall'opuscolo Lettura e insegnamento.
feel-free-to-browse-around-the-other-ava: Sentiti libero di esplorare le altre opzioni disponibili, o se preferisci puoi andare direttamente alla schermata di riproduzione e cominciare a usarla per visualizzare i contenuti multimediali.
file-not-available: The file is not available at this time. Please try again later, or add the file manually if you have it on your device.
fileProcessError: Si è verificato un errore nell'elaborazione di questo file
filetypeNotSupported: Questo tipo di file non è ancora supportato
firstDayOfWeek-explain: Select which day of the week should be displayed first in a calendar week.
folderToWatch-explain: The folder that will be monitored for new media files. This folder must contain subfolders named by date (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Files in folders that don’t follow this convention will be ignored.
hide-from-list-explain: Hidden files can be restored at any time using the 'Add media' menu.
hide-image-for-zoom-participants: Nascondi immagine per i partecipanti zoom
hideMediaLogo: Nascondi il logo JW dalla finestra di presentazione multimediale
hideMediaLogo-explain: Questo rimuove il logo quadrato JW dall'angolo in basso a destra. Se si usa in una Sala del Regno, nella maggior parte dei casi dovrebbe essere disabilitato.
images-videos-explain: Foto, video, file audio, documenti PDF, e altri file multimediali
in-what-language-should-media-be-downloa: In che lingua dovrebbero essere scaricati i media?
includePrinted-explain: Include additional images from the printed editions of publications that may not be available in the digital versions.
integrationsDescription: Configura l'integrazione con altre applicazioni e servizi
jwpub-file-explain: Publication downloaded from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses
jwpubNoMultimedia: Il file JWPUB non contiene multimedia
lang-explain: Scegli la lingua in cui si svolgono le adunanze. Questa è la lingua che verrà utilizzata per scaricare e riprodurre i media.
langFallback-explain: Qui puoi scegliere una lingua secondaria se i media spesso non sono disponibili nella lingua principale della congregazione.
langSubtitles-explain: This is the language in which subtitles will be downloaded and played.
latest-videos-from-jw-org: Latest videos from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses
local-media-explain-1: Add photos, videos, audio files, JW Library playlists, JWPUB files, or PDF documents from your computer and they will appear in the media list.
local-media-explain-2: All common media formats are supported.
localAppLang-explain: Questa è la lingua in cui verrà visualizzata M³. Non influirà sulla lingua in cui i media vengono scaricati.
look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Cerca questo pulsante in fondo alla pagina di M³:
m-is-now-ready-to-be-used: M³ è ora pronto per essere utilizzato.
make-sure-that-m-is-in-not-use-before-qu: Make sure that M³ is in not use before closing it.
maxRes-explain: Choose the maximum resolution for videos. Videos above this resolution will not be downloaded.
mediaRetrievalAndPlaybackDescription: Configure meeting media download and playback settings.
musicVolume-explain: Choose the volume of the background music playback. This allows you to set a lower volume for background music, while keeping the volume of other media high.
mwDay-explain: Choose the day on which the midweek meeting takes place.
mwStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the midweek meeting starts.
next-day-with-media: Go to the first day with media
no-circuit-overseer-date-set: The date of the circuit overseer's visit is not set
no-media-files-for-section: There are no media items for this meeting section.
no-results-explain: You'll need to enter your congregation's information manually if the lookup is unsuccessful.
no-results-short-explain: You'll need to enter more than two characters to start searching.
noDownloadsInProgress: No downloads are currently in progress
notice-the-yeartext-is-now-being-display: You'll notice the yeartext is now being displayed on the external monitor! But let's keep going.
obs-studio-is-a-free-app-used-to-manage-: OBS Studio is a free app used to manage camera and video feeds in many Kingdom Halls.
obsCameraScene: Scena di visualizzazione del palco predefinita in OBS Studio
obsCameraScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used as the default stage view. As per latest direction, this should be a wide shot.
obsEnable-explain: Connect M³ to OBS Studio to enable automated switching between media and camera scenes.
obsImageScene: Scene to display images in OBS Studio [optional]
obsImageScene-explain: A scene can be configured in OBS Studio specifically to display images, for example in a picture-in-picture style. If this is left blank, the default media scene will be used instead.
obsMediaScene: Scena della finestra multimediale in OBS Studio
obsMediaScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used to broadcast media to Zoom participants.
obsPassword-explain: Find the configured password under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
obsPort-explain: Find the configured port under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
obsQuickToggle-explain: When enabled, hovering over the OBS Studio button will open the scene switcher. This can be useful for quickly switching scenes in OBS Studio, especially if many scenes are configured.
obsSwitchSceneAfterMedia: Delay scene changes when playing media
obsSwitchSceneAfterMedia-explain: When enabled, OBS Studio will defer scene changes until after any currently playing media has finished. Note: enabling this option will also remove media and image scenes from the scene switcher.
once-the-scene-has-been-created-select-i: Una volta creata la scena, selezionala qui.
only-show-settings-that-are-not-valid: Mostra solo le impostazioni che non sono valide
please-use-image-or-jwpub: Selezionare un file immagine o un file JWPUB che contiene un'immagine
profile-type-regular: In most cases, choosing "Regular" is the best option. This will create a profile that downloads media for all meetings automatically and also enables media presentation features that are most often used during congregation meetings.
profile-type-special: Choose "Other" if you are creating a profile for which no media should be automatically downloaded. Media will have to be manually added for use in this profile. This type of profile is used mostly for theocratic schools, assemblies, and other special cases.
remove-all-cache: Rimuovi tutti i file dalla cache
remove-unused-cache: Rimuovi gli elementi inutilizzati dalla cache
rename-explain: Media items are not permanently renamed; the original name will be restored when the app is restarted.
scene-not-found: A problem occurred while activating a scene in OBS Studio.
scene-not-found-explain: Please validate the configured scenes in the settings.
select-a-custom-background: Choose an image that will be displayed as the background image instead of the yeartext. This would normally be used only on special occasions, such as the Memorial.
select-s34mp-to-add-public-talk-media: Select an S-34mp JWPUB file downloaded from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses to quickly access the Public Talk Media Playlist. The file will be cached and can be updated by browsing to an updated version at any time.
selected-jwpub-no-media: Il file JWPUB selezionato non contiene media.
setupWizard.intro: M³ is an app designed to make your playing media at congregation meetings easy and stress-free. Let's configure a few things, and then we'll get on our way.
shortcutMediaNext-explain: Shortcut to skip to the next video or picture in the list. This has no effect if a video is currently playing.
shortcutMediaPauseResume-explain: Shortcut to pause or resume the currently playing video. This only takes effect if a video is currently playing.
shortcutMediaPrevious-explain: Shortcut to skip to the previous video or picture in the list. This has no effect if a video is currently playing.
shortcutMediaStop-explain: Shortcut to stop the currently playing video or hide the currently displayed picture. This only takes effect if media is currently being displayed.
shortcutMediaWindow-explain: Shortcut to quickly hide or show the media window.
shortcutMusic-explain: Shortcut to start or stop the background music.
show-hidden-media-explain: This will show any media that was previously hidden for the currently selected day.
some-media-items-are-hidden: Some media items have been hidden. They can be shown using the 'Add media' menu if needed.
stop-playing-media-first: To navigate to a different page, please stop the media playback first.
stop-playing-media-first-explain: Page navigation is disabled while media is being presented.
successfully-migrated-from-the-previous-: Successfully migrated from the previous version
sureStopVideo: Are you sure you want to stop the video?
the-name-of-your-congregation-or-group-w: The profile name will help you to quickly switch between profiles, if you ever decide to create more than one in the future.
there-are-no-media-items-for-the-selecte: There are no media items for the selected date.
this-will-only-delete-media-for-this-day: This action will only remove extra media for the selected day
this-will-speed-up-media-retrieval-for-m: This will speed up media retrieval for meeting media, but is not mandatory.
to-quickly-show-and-hide-zoom-participan: Tip: To ensure you're able to quickly show and hide Zoom participants on the TV screens when needed, make sure that the setting to "use dual monitors" in Zoom is enabled.
tryConfiguringFallbackLanguage: Try configuring a fallback language in the settings
update-available: A new version of M³ is available! We recommend updating to receive the latest features, bug fixes, and security updates.
use-the-import-button-to-add-media-for-t: Use the 'Add extra media' button to add media for this date, or select a different date to view the corresponding media for that day.
use-the-slider-below-to-adjust-the-start: Use the slider below to adjust the start and end time of this media item. This is useful for playing only certain parts of a video.
weDay-explain: Choose the day on which the weekend meeting takes place.
weStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the weekend meeting starts.
well-start-fetching-media-while-we-wrap-: We'll start fetching media while we wrap up with our initial setup.
what-are-your-meeting-days-and-times-wel: What are your meeting days and times? We'll use this information to display the media calendar.
what-kind-of-profile-is-this: Choose the type of profile you would like to create.
what-language-would-you-like-m-to-be-dis: What language would you like M³ to be displayed in?
when-you-are-done-presenting-the-website: When you are done presenting the website, you can either close the website window, or click again on the button in the top right corner of this window.
when-you-click-the-button-on-the-top-rig: When you click the button on the top right corner of this window, a new window will open where the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses will be presented. What you see in this window will be mirrored into the media window.
would-you-like-to-enable-songbook-video-: Would you like to cache all songbook videos?
would-you-like-to-integrate-m-with-obs-s: Would you like to integrate M³ with OBS Studio?
pause-to-adjust-time: To enable scrubbing, the video must be paused
